sources.title: A Christmas Wedding Date | Full Romance Movie | Christmas Romcom
sources.description:
A Christmas Wedding Date - After Rebecca is fired, she goes back home to see her mother for the holidays where she also attends a wedding on Christmas Eve.
2012.  Stars: Marla Sokoloff, Chris Carmack, Catherine Hicks, George Wendt

metadata.Plot: After being fired, Rebecca hours back to her old home town to attend her friends wedding on Christmas Eve and visit her mother. But when she tries to return home she finds she must relive Christmas Eve over and over until she gets it right.
metadata.Writer: Jeffrey Schenck, Peter Sullivan, Fred Olen Ray
metadata.Actors: Marla Sokoloff, Chris Carmack, Catherine Hicks
